mi:PackageInformation.name: Orckestra.Forms.ContactForm
mi:PackageInformation.author: Orckestra A/S
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Adds a form to a page for visitors to contact and send messages to website owners.
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Adds a form to a page for visitors to contact and send messages to website owners.
